name: Obscura
description:
Obscura ‚Äì Multi-Language Code Obfuscation Tool

Obscura is a powerful code obfuscation app designed to help developers protect their source code across multiple languages. By converting human-readable code into a form that is intentionally difficult to understand while remaining fully functional, Obscura ensures that your logic and intellectual property remain safe from reverse engineering, copying, or unauthorized modifications.

What is Code Obfuscation?
Code obfuscation is a technique that transforms readable source code into a version that is hard to interpret, while preserving its functionality. Its primary purpose is deterrence ‚Äî it does not encrypt code but makes it more challenging for others to analyze, reuse, or tamper with your programs.

How Obscura Works
Obscura analyzes your code and converts it into encoded representations. A lightweight decoder is embedded directly in the output so that the program runs exactly like the original. This method ensures that your app or script works without any external dependencies or additional runtime setup. Obscura supports advanced encoding strategies to maximize protection while keeping performance efficient.

Supported Languages
HTML (HTML + CSS + JS in one file)
Bash
Python
JavaScript (separate files supported)

Common Use Cases
Protect proprietary logic in apps or scripts
Share demos safely without revealing full source code
Educational exploration of obfuscation techniques
Discourage direct code reuse or plagiarism
Prepare production code for deployment with extra security
Secure scripts for internal or commercial use

Advanced Features
Intelligent obfuscation patterns that maintain readability for the runtime but are unreadable for humans
Optional custom encoding keys for added security
Batch obfuscation of multiple files at once
Minimal footprint: the embedded decoder is lightweight and optimized

Ethical Use
Obscura is intended for educational, defensive, and legitimate commercial purposes only. Users must ensure they have proper authorization before obfuscating code that they do not own. Misuse of this tool to tamper with, hide malicious code, or distribute unauthorized applications is strictly prohibited.

Who Should Use Obscura?
Software developers
Script authors
Educators teaching programming or security concepts
Companies protecting proprietary tools
Anyone interested in learning and experimenting with code obfuscation

Why Choose Obscura?
‚úî Multi-language support
‚úî Lightweight and efficient output
‚úî Preserves original functionality
‚úî Secure obfuscation techniques
‚úî Easy to use with a clear interface

Get started with Obscura to safeguard your code, explore obfuscation methods, and share projects safely without revealing sensitive logic.

name: AI QUIZ
description:
AI Quiz App ‚Äì Learn Smarter, Not Harder


AI Quiz App is a smart learning companion designed to help students and learners test their understanding of any topic using AI-generated quizzes. Simply enter a topic or syllabus, choose the difficulty level, and the app instantly creates a structured quiz tailored to your learning needs.


Built with a clean, distraction-free interface, the app focuses on clarity, stability, and learning efficiency‚Äîno unnecessary clutter, no overwhelming animations, and no confusing navigation.
